explanation: [0-0] A right hand wearing a plastic glove is holding a white clam in the water. Various colored shells and rocks are visible around it.
[0-10] The right hand shakes the clam in the water twice, then picks it up and places it on a rock. The right hand picks up a knife and inserts it into the clam, and both hands open the clam.
